means: 动手脚和大声欢笑的玩闹

entry.def: Horseplay is rough play in which people push and hit each other, or behave in a silly way.

example.ex: ...the childish splashing and horseplay Mark indulged in.
example.tran: 马克所热衷的孩子气的泼水和打闹
